# isWrapped

**Instance Property**

Determines whether the text is wrapped to fit within the receiver’s bounds.

## Declaration

```swift
var isWrapped: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Text Alignment and Truncation

- **alignmentMode**: Determines how individual lines of text are horizontally aligned within the receiver’s bounds.
- **truncationMode**: Determines how the text is truncated to fit within the receiver’s bounds.
